name: subversion
buildScript: mkdir -p sqlite-amalgamation && curl -s http://www.sqlite.org/sqlite-autoconf-3071502.tar.gz | tar xz -O sqlite-autoconf-3071502/sqlite3.c > sqlite-amalgamation/sqlite3.c && ./configure --prefix=/tmp/vendor-build --enable-all-static --with-apr=/app/vendor/bin/apr-1-config --with-apr-util=/app/vendor/bin/apr-1-config --with-neon --without-gssapi && make install
